text: Lefevere in 2012 Jasper Lefevere (born 13 July 1988) is a Belgian judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 66 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the first round by Zhansay Smagulov. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Belgium Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:European Games competitors for Belgium Category:Judoka at the 2015 European Games
title: Jasper Lefevere
